resources.string:
Version includes:
 DB, CRUD, Data Models
 Image Reading
 Basic UI, DB-to-ListView Integration
 ListView Item Detailing
 Asynchronous Image Download
 List search function
 Multithreading!!!!!
 Database dependency!

\"knowITherbal\" is an application used by the botanists and future botanist, hikers, and common people for identifying herbal plant\'s leaf captured by the application using the mobile phone camera and analyze the image by using some of the algorithms to identify the feature of the leaf.

Controlled Environment

• When capturing a plant's leaf, it is recommended to place white background behind the plant. 

• If possible, approximate a distance of 1ft from the subject plant to your mobile phone camera.
Well-Lit Environment\n\n• Well-Lit environment can produce good image and can lead to better results.
